Title: Matichya Chuli
Actors: Sudhir Joshi, Vandana Gupte, Anand Abhyankar, Ankush Choudhary
Plot: Matichya Chuli was released in 2005. Produced by Ashwami Manjrekar and directed by Atul Kale along with Sudesh V. Manjerekar. The movie portrays a humorous manner of the archetypal relationship between a mother-in-law and daughter-in-law.
